Posts.Content: JessRN wrote: Hi guys, so I'm new here. A little about myself. I'm 31, married for 12 years, 2 great kids. A career in nursing(neonates). And a few months ago I noticed some green discharge from both breasts. From my right breast in one duct blood began to come out. So I got an appt with my Ob/gyn who did a ton of labs and then sent me in for a mammo/ ultrasound. I was then referred to a breast surgeon who sent me in for a ductogram which I had yesterday. At first glance the radiologist said everything looked great but called me 2 hours later an apologized profusely and told me I have some suspicious areas and will most likely need surgery. Since yesterday I've now gotten blood out of my left breast. I'm terrified! Anyone else have a similar experience? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Waiting and worried JessRN Moderators

At first glance the radiologist said everything looked great but called me 2 hours later an apologized profusely and told me I have some suspicious areas and will most likely need surgery. Posts.Content: Mar 23, 2013 01:58AM JessRN wrote: Ladies thank you so much for your replies! I'm hoping it will all turn out ok. I appreciate you taking the time to give me advice, I'm so happy I found this place to get encouragement from such stong women. Thank you!
